caption: I came this morning, August 15, in the cool of the morning. The doors were open at 8:30 a.m. but I was refused access because entry was delayed until 9 a.m. due to the public holiday. I admit having asked to enter even though I had set foot in the enclosure. The guard made incorrect and disrespectful comments like “I don’t care” What deplorable behavior

This place is heavenly for a cemetery…. There Nature is strongly present there and it is a joy to know my mother living in such a vast and wild place. As for the criticisms on. The maintenance and the wild weeds I don't agree, the nature is wild which gives a non-depressing side to this cemetery and that feels good. Watering cans are available, the Lovely staff and for Old people Cars can circulate. Nothing to say, this Cemetery park is the best thing in Paris . We can gather in Peace without having Everything World sticks to us. So only happiness for these moments of misfortune. Thank you to all the cemetery staff and Maintains who Arrives perfectly. Sidonie pontanier
A shame to the City of Paris. The grass is so tall that we cannot access the graves. I go to this cemetery regularly, and it's getting worse and worse!
Too bad the poorly maintained cemetery, it's the first time I've seen that, I'm disappointed

Very calm and relaxing place. My grandparents are buried there, it's a bit of a hassle to find the graves but ask for information at reception and they will show you the location very professionally! Lots of cats walking around which gives a little life to this place ♥️
Grasses 50 centimeters high in all the paths and everywhere in the cemetery, I have never seen a cemetery in such bad condition. Thank you the city of Paris. A shame!!!

Fountains where you have to wait 10 minutes to fill your watering can with water, plus those where there is absolutely no water. A shame for the plants and the people who sometimes go far beyond, and this heat is a plus!!! Maintenance in general, but especially in the paths between the tombs, where it is difficult to walk without regularly twisting your feet. When it comes to surveillance in general but especially to prevent theft, then the…..

First of all, very sad that Mr. and Mrs. Thoin closed their establishment. We had been accustomed to them for several generations. Happy retirement, Mr. and Mrs. Thoin. On the other hand, I would like to point out to the cemetery that I am used to caring for several fallen people regularly. You have restricted the water in the fountains. Some fountains work very poorly. Can you repair the fountain which is located in division 9. To get water in a watering can it takes 1 hour. Can you fix this problem? While following the water restriction some fountains are working correctly. Hoping that the cemetery will repair this fountain. I thank you for that

Yesterday, October 6, in the afternoon, I went to maintain family graves, as I do at least once a year, and I was unpleasantly surprised to find them invaded by wild grass, sometimes reaching a height of fifty. of centimeters, thus demonstrating that the small paths between them are perhaps only weeded for All Saints' Day, not to mention the continual disappearance of artificial flower pots and other objects of homage. And what about the people pushing prams, entering towards 4:30 p.m., talking very loudly to each other and howling with laughter... Where are the guards? This is all very appalling!
On this Sunday, April 16, 2023, no florist is open on avenue du cemetery since Maison Thoin closed for good. They provided permanence. I already regret them

Obnoxious guard at the entrance and as we did not know the procedure we went directly to the burial site. There, a little leader calls out to us, telling us that we should never have come, that we should return immediately to the entrance: it was my father's funeral with my 88-year-old mother. These people imbued with their little power, I really wish them to experience what they did to us today. They could speak kindly to us, but no, that would be too much to ask of them. Beings devoid of any humanity.
It is for sure the most poorly maintained cemetery it is practically abandoned no water for the plants and no workers to clean it or its managers cordially
GOOD
Reopening at normal hours. Place guarded and very well maintained. Bravo for the interviews.
Quiet and very friendly for a walk, reading a book,… very beautiful in spring.
It's always a shame to have to go there but when you have to it's true that the setting is nice
closing 5:30 p.m. it’s too early
You have to visit it, it is very big.
hello, I find it pleasant to ask for information from this cemetery, I find the staff very welcoming
Quiet and well-maintained place and friendly staff
Boiler fault noted on the first night
Was better maintained before
Definitely take a look. The effort
Very unpleasant guard and lack of professionalism!
Lack of maintenance in certain aisles.
A calm and respectful place
Quiet and very large
Too glock place!
Immense calm reigns
